@CajunDoughBoi May we suggest to have it in a secured airtight plastic bag, JD. Thank you.

@CajunDoughBoi Hi, JD. This will be allowed in your carry-on baggage. Liquids, aerosols, and gels (LAGs) in 100ml or less are the only ones allowed in handcarried baggage.

@Afafa84023649 You're welcome, Dapi! See you on board! :)

urls.title: Travel during COVID
urls.description: Travel requirements are subject to change at short notice by the issuing government authority. As such, posting of the advisories below is not real-time and serve only as a guide. Please confirm your requirements directly with the offices/websites of your place of origin and destination. All passengers are encouraged to follow the guide, register in advance and pre-book their hotels as necessary to avoid any inconvenience and experience faster processing upon arrival. Per PAL’s Conditions of Carriage,

data.text: @dietricfaith Hi, Anna. Travel guide varies per destination. You may check the travel rules and requirements here: https://t.co/eTai7nQ3NJ

urls.title: Manage Booking
urls.description: Change in travel plans due to COVID? We assure you that your current tickets are safe and remain valid. We have enhanced some of our polices to give you more flexibility due to the evolving COVID-19 situation, and uncertainties of travel. To view your options if your flight is affected by cancellations or travel bans click here. Enhance your flight experience and get the most out of your trip with add-ons and extras tailored to your travel

data.text:
@kakerun_48 You may try rebooking your flight via our Manage Booking facility in our website.

https://t.co/jch0Dnwvg1

@PhilSirr Hi, Philip. We apologize for this. We are updating our website to give a better online booking experience for our passengers. Thank you for taking the time letting us know what we need to improve on.

data.text: @kulutz_ Hi, Patrick. You may directly contact our @PALMabuhayMiles team for assistance on this here on Twitter.

@kakerun_48 Thank you for this information, Kakerun48. As checked, there has been an operational requirement that's why the flight had to be cancelled. Passengers will be accommodated to the next available flight. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience this has caused.
@kakerun_48 Hi, Kakerun48. We're truly sorry for the inconvenience brought by the schedule change. May we know your flight number?
@ishential @madobell Hi, Ish. How may we help you?
@fulljade Hi, Jade. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by the schedule adjustment. We have sent you a DM to assist you in this regard. Thank you.
@dianne_alejo We apologize for the inconvenience, DV. Thank you for letting us know.
@dianne_alejo Hi, DV. We're sorry to hear this. May we kindly request to try clearing your browser's cache or try using a different device or browser?
@Manuherrera_28 Hi, Super. We have sent you a DM for further assistance on this.
@melissacaratti Hi, Melissa. We're sorry you feel that way. May we know more on your experience, so we could assist you better?
@PenGwen06330023 Hi, Pen! We've sent you a DM, for us to check this on your behalf.
@ChukFarley Hi, Chuk. We're sorry for the delay this has taken. We've already requested for a follow up on your behalf and we assure you that we'll update you through DM once we have news.
@gaysalazar05 This is noted. We have sent you a DM for further assistance on this.
@gaysalazar05 May we know the mode of payment that you chose?

data.text: @gaysalazar05 You may check our website, https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ, for flight status updates starting two (2) days before your flight departure date, Loriegay. Thank you!

data.text:
@renofree1 Hi, Renofree. We suggest to standby for updates. You may also check our website from time to time for latest developments. Thank you.

https://t.co/ePCV23PQfZ
@tita_carolganda @PALMabuhayMiles You're welcome. :)
@YoonJin853 You're welcome.
@marlon_luistro Hi, Marlon. We sent you a DM. Please check. Thank you.
@mrjbart Hi, Jerome. We've sent you a DM for us to look into your concern. Thank you.

@BadTaco784 Hi, Nikki! We're sorry to hear about this. Allow us to assist you further on your Travel Credit concern. 

We're trying to send you a DM, however we're unable to. Kindly make sure you're following our account here, so we could send you a DM for your details. https://t.co/9Xjno4tPaq
@tita_carolganda Hello, Tita Carol. Thank you for raising this matter to us. We are taking serious note of this as this will surely help us improve the user interface. @PALMabuhayMiles
@PatPSquare One moment, please. We'll have it checked.
@PatPSquare We're sorry to hear about the delay on your refund, Pat. We'll send you a DM for us to ask for your booking details, in order for us to follow up on your behalf.
@C_B_43 Hi Case. We sent you a DM. Please check. Thank you.
@PatPSquare We understand your sentiments, Pat. Per checking, the concerned station is still looking into your concern. May we suggest to wait for further updates. We'd appreciate your patience.
@kimberlyjaadee We are sorry about this. We have sent you a DM. Please check. Thank you.
@kimberlyjaadee Hi! May we know if you are in communication with our We Care Team?
@PatPSquare Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience, Pat. We will request for a follow-up with the concerned station.
@bulcachonk Hi Chewie. We're sorry to hear this. May we know what happened?
@YoonJin853 Hi! This should be in your check-in baggage.
@dody55540944 Hi, Dody! May we kindly ask you to adjust your account's privacy settings so we can send you a DM and assist you further. Thank you.
@gayforcate You're welcome. Have a nice day!

@gayforcate You may bring multiple bags as long as you will not exceed your total check-in baggage allowance. The check-in baggage should not exceed a maximum dimension (length + width + height) of 62 in. (158 cm). Thank you!
@gayforcate Hello, lee 🍑. May we know your flight route, please? Thank you!
@redcheekfaney Hello, Delicioza. Our sincerest apologies for this. Kindly allow us to coordinate with the handling office and request for a follow-up on your behalf. Thank you.
@fakiefrontbiggy Got it, @fakiefrontbiggy. Kindly check our DM for us to proceed with assisting you regarding your baggage.
@alreadychill We have sent you a DM. Please check your inbox.
@dyyamamura Hi Diana. If the passengers are under one booking, they can pool their baggage allowance.
@fakiefrontbiggy We apologize for the inconvenience. May we confirm if a report was filed upon arrival? Please follow us so we could send you a DM. Thank you.

data.text: @Sagitta52990381 Hi, Sagittarius. We've tried sending you a dm but your settings do not allow us to do so. Kindly check.
@bryanericbryan Apologies for the inconvenience, B May we suggest to reinstall the Mobile App? Have you also tried to clear your browser's cache and cookies?
@link_physio Hi, Saurab. We're sorry to hear about your experience. We've sent you a DM for us to look into your concern.
@jamesagudelo08 Thank you for choosing Philippine Airlines, James! We hope for your continued valuable support and patronage in our flag carrier. ❤✈
@cucaimonster Hi, Mikaela. We're truly sorry to hear this. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. We'll send you a dm so we can ask for your details.
@ItsAmandaBooz Hi, Amanda. We have sent you a dm. Kindly check.
@Drew44083700 You're welcome, Drew. :)
@Drew44083700 This is noted, Drew. You may then present your Passport or valid ID, in case this will be verified by our airport personnel. Thank you.
@_AyaAfrica Hi, Aya. We will send you a DM once we receive feedback regarding your baggage claim. Thank you.
@Drew44083700 May we know if the passenger is the account owner? Thank you.
@_AyaAfrica We'll have this forwarded to the concerned station, Aya. Again, we sincerely apologize for the inconvenience that this has caused.
@_AyaAfrica We assure you that we are already looking into this, Aya. We'll get back to you as soon as we have news.
@Acheson91 Hi, Acheson. We are sorry to hear about the missing luggage. May we know if you filed a report for this incident?
@Drew44083700 Hi, Drew. We encourage to bring your previous debit card as well in case this will be reviewed by our check-in agents at the airport. Thank you.

@aqilla_qiqi You only have to comply with the requirements of your final destination, Aqilla. However, we highly encourage our passengers to coordinate with the government unit of their origin/destination for the most recent travel information. Thank you.

@kimiberr Hi, Kimber. Our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience. We assure you that we wouldn't disrupt a flight unless it was deemed necessary. While we endeavor to uphold our on time performance, we, at all times keep your safety as our number one priority. Thank you and stay safe.
@mikoalino Thank you as well for your kind understanding, Miko!
@aqilla_qiqi Hi, Aqilla. May we confirm if both flights are under one booking and are operated by PAL?
@niru_iiv We're truly sorry to hear this, Niru. It will be best to coordinate with the local authorities regarding this. Thank you.
